data.title: AlphaPept
data.description: A modular, python-based framework for mass spectrometry. Powered by nbdev.
data.name: alphapept

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "1.  Download the latest installer"
"AlphaPept: a modern and open framework for MS-based proteomics" and citation to a Nature Communications paper indicate a research-focused proteomics tool developed by a lab-sized team.

"AlphaPept can be used as an application as a whole or as a Python Package where individual modules are called" and the GUI/CMD usage show it is an end-user analysis application for MS-based proteomics workflows.
